title: Fluvoxamine for Treating COVID-19
itunes:title: Fluvoxamine for Treating COVID-19
description:
How effective is fluvoxamine in patients with COVID-19? A 2-week course of full-dose fluvoxamine decreased clinical deterioration in outpatients with symptomatic COVID-19 infection.

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Lorena Rodríguez, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 30
  • Fluvoxamine vs Placebo and Clinical Deterioration in Outpatients With Symptomatic COVID-19
